location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, George Green, to Captains Charles Elphinstone and Lawrence Nilson, commanders of the expedition fleet against Carrack [Kharg Island]

mods.abstract: The letter is cover for copies of George Skipp's letters (not present) from Shiraz which contain news of the Caun's [Karim Khan] promises of assistance against MÄ«r Muhanna and a plan of the island's fort made by Signor Rigo in 1756.
